dict.acceptation: 有限的；（君主权力）受宪法限制的；〈美〉乘客名额有限制的；（智力，能力等）有限的；
高级快车；直达的火车或汽车；

sent.orig: Other Limited Liability Corporations refer to limited liability corporations other than exclusive state-funded corporations.
sent.trans: 其他有限责任公司：指国有独资公司以外的有限责任公司。

sent.orig: Article 3 Limited liability companies and joint stock limited companies are enterprise legal persons.
sent.trans: 第三条：有限责任公司和股份有限公司是企业法人。

sent.orig: Foreign limited liability company and Limited are all the assets of the company responsible.
sent.trans: 有限责任公司和股份有限公司对外都是以公司的全部资产承担责任。

sent.orig: Market of ● China power shows level can limited market, limited competition, finite forestall.
sent.trans: 中国电力市场现阶段只能有限市场、有限竞争、有限垄断。

sent.orig: The creation and operation of limited partnerships are governed by the various state limited partnership acts.
sent.trans: 有限合伙企业的成立和经营实用各州的有限合伙企业法。
